messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1335
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/18/01 3:49:19 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/18/01 3:49:19 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
P.S. (But, to be fair, I have 7 charming nieces and nephews who went to
public school and they are all lovely people, so I should cut back on the
sweeping stereotypes. One of these days... <g>)

>>


Very difficult for me since I just witnessed the ruination of my child's
kind and considerate self. Proves to me she is too impressionable of a
personality to go to school. Plus my nephews are rude and snappy 2 w/ each
sister in law and in different parts of the state. Blech!

Time will heal this I know. Unfortunately yesterday was a yucky day for
us. Today is another go at it.

NICKI~
